original: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate |

original: tatra ca punarbījasya naivaṃ bhavati-ahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti |

analyzed: atha bīje sati ca kāraṇa bhūte aṅkurasya abhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

analyzed: evam yāvat puṣpe sati phalasya abhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ ca bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ ||
analyzed: evam ca bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetu upanibandhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: punaḥ kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ ?
analyzed: punar katham bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyaya upanibandhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
ṣaṇṇām dhātūnām samavāyāt
svabhāva dhāraṇāt dhātuḥ

yat idam pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa dhātu samanvayāt bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyaya upanibandhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
tatra pṛthivi dhātuḥ bījasya saṃdhāraṇa kṛtyam karoti
ap dhātuḥ bījam snehayati
tejaḥ dhātuḥ bījam paripācayati
vāyu dhātuḥ bījam abhinirharati
ākāśa dhātuḥ bījasya an āvaraṇa kṛtyam karoti
ṛtuḥ api bījasya pariṇāma kṛtyam karoti
asatsu pratyayeṣu bījāt aṅkurasya abhinirvṛttiḥ na bhavati
yadā bāhyaḥ ca pṛthivī dhātuḥ avikalaḥ bhavati
evam ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa ṛtu dhātavaḥ ca avikalāḥ bhavanti
tatas teṣām sarveṣām samavāyāt bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati

original: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ bījasya dhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomi iti |
analyzed: tatra pṛthivī dhātoḥ na evam bhavati aham bījasya dhāraṇā kṛtyam karomi iti

original: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomi iti |
analyzed: evam yāvat ṛtoḥ api na evam bhavati aham bījasya pariṇāmanā kṛtyam karomi iti
aṅkurasya api na evam bhavati aham ebhiḥ pratyayaiḥ janitaḥ iti

original: atha punaḥ satsu pratyayeṣu teṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati |
analyzed: atha punar satsu pratyayeṣu teṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati

original: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto nākāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaśca
analyzed: sa ca ayam aṅkuraḥ na svayaṃkṛtaḥ na para kṛtaḥ na ubhaya kṛtaḥ na īśvara nirmitaḥ na kāla pariṇāmitaḥ na prakṛti saṃbhūtaḥ na akāraṇa adhīnaḥ na api ahetu samutpannaḥ ca
pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa dhātu samavāyāt bije nirudhyamāne aṅkurasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati
evam bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyaya upanibandhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
tatra bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ

original: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti |

katham na śāśvatataḥ iti
yasmāt anyaḥ oṅkuraḥ anyat bījam

atas na ucchedataḥ
katham na saṃkrāntitaḥ

parīttam bījam upyate

ityatas parītta hetutaḥ vipula phala abhinirvṛttitaḥ

ityatas tad sadṛśa anubandhataḥ ca iti
evam bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

yat idam avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ

avidyā ced na abhaviṣyat

original: evaṃ yāvadyadi jātirnābhaviṣyat (skandhānāṃ pañcānāṃ prādurbhāvo jātiriti)
analyzed: evam yāvat yadi jātiḥ na abhaviṣyat skandhānām pañcānām prādurbhāvaḥ jātiḥ iti

atha ca satyām avidyāyām saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati iti

original: punaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmapyevaṃ na bhavati-vayamavidyayā abhinirvartitā iti |

na evam bhavati aham jarā maraṇam abhinirvartayāmi iti

original: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttiebhavati prādurbhāva eva,
analyzed: atha ca satyām avidyāyām saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttiḥ e bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ eva

original: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ |

tatra ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivī dhātuḥ katamaḥ iti
kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ saṃparkāt
kaṭhina bhāvam abhinirvartayati
ayam ucyate pṛthivī dhātuḥ
yaḥ punar kāyasya svīkāra saṃcaya kṛtyam
karoti ayam ucyate ap dhātuḥ

original: yaśca punaḥ kāyasya aśitaṃ pītaṃ bhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ ||
analyzed: yaḥ ca punar kāyasya aśitam pītam bhakṣitam paripācayati ayam ucyate tejaḥ dhātuḥ
yaḥ kāyasya āśvāsa praśvāsa kṛtyam vāyoḥ ākarṣaṇam āśvāsaḥ etat kṛtyam
karoti ayam ucyate vāyu dhātuḥ
yaḥ kāyasya antar śauṣirya bhāvam abhinirvartayati
ayam ucyate ākāśa dhātuḥ
yaḥ nāma rūpam abhinirvartayati naḍa kalāpa yogena cakṣuḥ ādi pañcavidha vijñāna kāya vijñāna samūha
saṃyuktam sa āsravam sa āvaraṇam
manaḥ vijñānam
ayam ucyate vijñāna dhātuḥ
asatsu pratyayeṣu kāyasya utpattiḥ na bhavati
yadā ca ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivī dhātuḥ avikalaḥ bhavati
evam ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa vijñāna dhātavaḥ ca avikalāḥ bhavanti
tat steṣām sarveṣām samavāyāt kāyasya utpattiḥ bhavati
tatra pṛthivī dhātoḥ na evam bhavati aham kāyasya kaṭhina tvam abhinirvartayāmi iti
ap dhātoḥ na evam bhavati aham kāyasya anuparigraham karomi iti
tejaḥ dhātoḥ na evam bhavati aham kāyasya aśita pīta khāditam paripācayāmi iti
vāyu dhātoḥ na evam bhavati aham kāyasya āśvāsa praśvāsa kṛtyam karomi iti
ākāśa dhātoḥ na evam bhavati aham kāyasya antar śauṣirya bhāvam abhinirvartayāmi iti
vijñāna dhātoḥ na evam bhavati aham kāyam abhinirvartayāmi iti
kāyasya api na evam bhavati aham ebhiḥ pratyaya viśeṣaiḥ janitaḥ iti
atha ca satsu pratyayeṣu kāyasya utpattiḥ bhavati
tatra pṛthivī dhātuḥ na ātmā na muktaḥ na baddhaḥ

original: atha na mātāpitṛsaṃyogāt ṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādātprabuddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratropapattyā mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,

tat yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ cakṣuḥ vijñānam utpadyate
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ

original: cakṣuśca pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam |
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ca pratītya rūpam ca ālokam ca ākāśam ca tad ja manasikāram ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥ vijñānam
tatra cakṣuḥ vijñānasya cakṣuḥ āśraya kṛtyam karoti
rūpam ālambana kṛtyam karoti
āloka uvabhāsa kṛtyam karoti
ākāśam an āvaraṇa kṛtyam karoti
tad ja manasikāraḥ samanvāharaṇa kṛtyam karoti
asatsu pratyayeṣu cakṣuḥ vijñānam na utpadyate
yadā cakṣuḥ ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalam bhavati
evam rūpa āloka ākāśa tad ja manasikārāḥ ca avikalāḥ bhavanti
tatas sarveṣām samavāyāt cakṣuḥ vijñānasya utpattiḥ bhavati

original: tatrāpi cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya āśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: tatra api cakṣuṣaḥ na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya āśraya kṛtyam karomi iti

original: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avalambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: rūpasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya avalambana kṛtyam karomi iti

original: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: ālokasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya avabhāsa kṛtyam karomi iti

original: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: ākāśasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya an āvaraṇa kṛtyam karomi iti

original: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: tad ja manasikārasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya samanvāharaṇa kṛtyam karomi iti
cakṣuḥ vijñānasya api na evam bhavati aham ebhiḥ pratyaya samavāyaiḥ janitaḥ iti

original: atha ca satsu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati |
analyzed: atha ca satsu pratyayeṣu cakṣuḥ vijñānasya utpattiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati
evam śeṣāṇām indriyāṇām yathāyogam kartavyam

original: tatra pratītyasamutpāde na kaściddharmo asmāllokātparalokaṃ saṃkrāmati,
analyzed: tatra pratītyasamutpāde na kaścid dharmaḥ asmāt lokāt para lokam saṃkrāmati
iti śāśvata anta niṣedhaḥ

original: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyā āyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,

analyzed: na tu ye eva maraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ

original: yaḥ kaścidbhadanta śāradvatīputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatena samyakpraṇītaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitaṃ ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad(vi)

original: parītaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akṛtaṃ asaṃskṛtaṃ apramitaṃ anāvaraṇaṃ śivaṃ abhayaṃ ahāryaṃ avyayaṃ avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,

sa na pūrva antam pratisarati kim aham abhūvam atītedhvani āhosvit na abhūvam atītedhvani
kaḥ nu aham abhūvam atīta idhvani

original: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati-kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyahamanāgate'dhvani,

āhosvit na bhaviṣyāmi aham anāgatedhvani

katham svid idam
ki santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ iti
ārya daśabhūmake pi uktam tatra avidyā tṛṣṇā ukā dānam kleśa vartmanaḥ vyavacchedaḥ

original: utpannā jātu dṛśyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana“ ||

original: tatra sato vidyamānasyotpādāyogāt vidyamānasyotpāde niravadhijanmaprasaṅgenānavasthā syāt |
analyzed: tatra sataḥ vidyamānasya utpāda ayogāt vidyamānasya utpāde niravadhi janma prasaṅgena anavasthā syāt
asat utpāde śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām utpāda prasaṅgāt hetoḥ prāk asat iti ced
tat eva cintyate hetoḥ kim utpadyate sat asat vā
ubhaya ātmakasya utpāde viruddha dharmayoḥ eka svabhāva tā abhyupagamaḥ katham syāt

miśra pratītiḥ api na asti

original: satyam, yadi vyavahartavyaikaśarīratāṃ tyaktvā prasahya rūpasyābhāvasya kiṃcidrūpaṃ syāt,
